author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This  code was calling `putenv()` (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46002#issuecomment-2451996693), but turned out to be unused, so this PR proposes to remove the code.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1142

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Remove `ReadBase` as unused
